Reason: The configuration option 'cdc_total_space_in_mb' is classified as performance-sensitive. This is because the total space available for change-data-capture logs on disk directly impacts the system's performance and stability. If the space usage exceeds the configured value, it can lead to WriteTimeoutException on Mutations, causing notable performance variations at the system level.
